name: Moon Run Complete
description:
Run to escape the Moon before you are obliterated!

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D for movement. You can only move when touching the ground (L and R lights are green).
  • Esc to bring up the menu
  • Right-click to free-look
  • Space to jump, but you should never, ever, do that on the moon.

A follow up to our Godot Wild Jam #48 submission: Moon Run

Github
